00070         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {
00071                 $this->componentManager = $componentManager;

00091         protected function clearTempFiles($olderThan) {
00092                 if(!$olderThan) {
00093                         return;
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 //get temp upload folder
00097                 $uploadFolder = $this->getTempUploadFolder();
00098 
00099                 //build absolute path to upload folder
00100                 $path = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$uploadFolder;
00101 
00102                 //read files in directory
00103                 $tmpFiles = t3lib_div::getFilesInDir($path);
00104 
00105                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('cleaning_temp_files',$path);
00106 
00107                 //calculate threshold timestamp
00108                 //hours * 60 * 60 = millseconds
00109                 $threshold = time() - $olderThan * 60 * 60;
00110 
00111                 //for all files in temp upload folder
00112                 foreach($tmpFiles as $file) {
00113 
00114                         //if creation timestamp is lower than threshold timestamp
00115                         //delete the file
00116                         $creationTime = filemtime($path.$file);
00117 
00118                         //fix for different timezones
00119                         $creationTime += date("O")/100*60;
00120                         if($creationTime < $threshold) {
00121                                 unlink($path.$file);
00122                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('deleting_file',$file);
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 
00141         protected function getTempUploadFolder() {
00142 
00143                 //set default upload folder
00144                 $uploadFolder = '/uploads/mailformplusplus/tmp/';
00145 
00146                 //if temp upload folder set in TypoScript, take that setting
00147                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['files.']['tmpUploadFolder']) {
00148                         $uploadFolder = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['files.']['tmpUploadFolder'];
00149                         $uploadFolder = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($uploadFolder);
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 //if the set directory doesn't exist, print a message
00153                 #if(!is_dir(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$uploadFolder)) {
00154                 #               F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Folder: '".F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$uploadFolder."' doesn't exist!");
00155                 #       }
00156                 if(!is_dir(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getTYPO3Root().$uploadFolder)) {
00157                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('folder_doesnt_exist',F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getTYPO3Root().$uploadFolder);
00158                 }
00159                 return $uploadFolder;
00160         }

00177         protected function clearSession() {
00178                 session_start();
00179                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues']);
00180                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']);
00181                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep']);
00182                 unset($_SESSION['submitted_ok']);
00183                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['usedSuffix']);
00184                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['usedSettings']);
00185                 unset($_SESSION['startblock']);
00186                 unset($_SESSION['endblock']);
00187                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('cleared_session');
00188         }

00198         protected function processFiles() {
00199                 session_start();
00200 
00201                 //if files were uploaded
00202                 if(isset($_FILES) && is_array($_FILES) && !empty($_FILES)) {
00203 
00204                         //get upload folder
00205                         $uploadFolder = $this->getTempUploadFolder();
00206 
00207                         //build absolute path to upload folder
00208                         $uploadPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getTYPO3Root().$uploadFolder;
00209 
00210                         if(!file_exists($uploadPath)) {
00211                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('folder_doesnt_exist',$uploadPath);
00212                                 return;
00213                         }
00214                         //for all file properties
00215                         /*
00216                         * $_FILES looks like this:
00217                         *
00218                         * Array (
00219                         *       [mailformplusplus] => Array (
00220                         *               [name] => Array (
00221                         *       [picture] =>
00222                         *       [picture2] => Wasserlilien.jpg
00223                         *       )
00224                         *               [type] => Array (
00225                         *       [picture] =>
00226                         *       [picture2] => image/jpeg
00227                         *       )
00228                         *               [tmp_name] => Array (
00229                         *       [picture] =>
00230                         *       [picture2] => /cluster/ispman/temp/phpbqqUEg
00231                         *       )
00232                         *               [error] => Array (
00233                         *       [picture] => 4
00234                         *       [picture2] => 0
00235                         *       )
00236                         *               [size] => Array (
00237                         *       [picture] => 0
00238                         *       [picture2] => 83794
00239                         *       )
00240                         *        )
00241                         *)
00242                         */
00243                         foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00244 
00245                                 //if a file was uploaded
00246                                 if(isset($files['name']) && is_array($files['name'])) {
00247 
00248                                         //for all file names
00249                                         foreach($files['name'] as $field=>$name) {
00250                                                 $filename = substr($name, 0, strpos($name, '.'));
00251                                                 if(strlen($filename) > 0) {
00252                                                         $ext = substr($name, strpos($name, '.'));
00253                                                         $suffix = 1;
00254 
00255                                                         //build file name
00256                                                         $uploadedFileName = $filename.$ext;
00257 
00258                                                         //rename if exists
00259                                                         while(file_exists($uploadPath.$uploadedFileName)) {
00260                                                                 $uploadedFileName = $filename."_".$suffix.$ext;
00261                                                                 $suffix++;
00262 
00263                                                         }
00264                                                         $files['name'][$field] = $uploadedFileName;
00265 
00266                                                         //move from temp folder to temp upload folder
00267                                                         #print $files['tmp_name'][$field];
00268                                                         #print $uploadPath.$uploadedFileName;
00269                                                         move_uploaded_file($files['tmp_name'][$field],$uploadPath.$uploadedFileName);
00270                                                         $files['uploaded_name'][$field] = $uploadedFileName;
00271 
00272                                                         //set values for $_SESSION
00273                                                         $tmp['name'] = $name;
00274                                                         $tmp['uploaded_name'] = $uploadedFileName;
00275                                                         $tmp['uploaded_path'] = $uploadPath;
00276                                                         $tmp['uploaded_folder'] = $uploadFolder;
00277                                                         $tmp['uploaded_url'] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('TYPO3_SITE_URL').$uploadFolder.$uploadedFileName;
00278                                                         $tmp['size'] = $files['size'][$field];
00279                                                         $tmp['type'] = $files['type'][$field];
00280                                                         if(!is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field]) && strlen($field)) {
00281                                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field] = array();
00282                                                         }
00283                                                         array_push($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field],$tmp);
00284                                                 }
00285                                         }
00286                                 }
00287                         }
00288                 }
00289         }

00298         public function setTemplateFile($template) {
00299                 $this->templateFile = $template;

00309         protected function runClasses($classesArray) {
00310                 if(isset($classesArray) && is_array($classesArray)) {
00311                         foreach($classesArray as $tsConfig) {
00312                                 $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00313                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_class',$className);
00314                                 
00315                                 $obj = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00316                                 $this->gp = $obj->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00317                         }
00318                 }
00319         }
00320 
00327         public function validateConfig(&$settings) {
00328 
00329                 $options = array(
00330                 array('to_email', 'sEMAILADMIN', 'finishers', 'F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail'),
00331                 array('to_email', 'sEMAILUSER', 'finishers', 'F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail'),
00332                 array('redirect_page', 'sMISC', 'finishers', 'F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect'),
00333                 array('required_fields', 'sMISC', 'validators', 'F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default'),
00334                 );
00335 
00336                 foreach ($options as $option) {
00337                         $fieldName = $option[0];
00338                         $flexformSection = $option[1];
00339                         $component = $option[2];
00340                         $componentName = $option[3];
00341 
00342                         $value = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'],$fieldName, $flexformSection);
00343 
00344                         // Check if a Mail Finisher can be found in the config
00345                         $isConfigOk = FALSE;
00346                         if (is_array($settings[$component .'.'])) {
00347                                 foreach ($settings[$component .'.'] as $finisher) {
00348                                         if ($finisher['class'] == $componentName) {
00349                                                 $isConfigOk = TRUE;
00350                                                 break;
00351                                         } elseif ($finisher['class'] == str_replace('F3_MailformPlusPlus_','',$componentName)) {
00352                                                 $isConfigOk = TRUE;
00353                                                 break;
00354                                         }
00355                                 }
00356                         }
00357 
00358                         // Throws an Exception if a problem occurs
00359                         if ($value != '' && !$isConfigOk) {
00360                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::throwException('missing_component',$component,$value,$componentName);
00361                         }
00362                 }
00363         }
00364 
00370         public function process() {
00371                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_controller','F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default');
00372                 
00373                 session_start();
00374 
00375                 //read settings
00376                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00377                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00378 
00379                 //set debug mode
00380                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = ($settings['debug'] == '1') ? TRUE : FALSE;
00381 
00382                 // Validate the configuration, throw a possible exception
00383                 $this->validateConfig($settings);
00384 
00385                 //set gp vars
00386                 $this->gp = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00387                 if($settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00388                         $this->gp = $this->gp[$settings['formValuesPrefix']];
00389                 }
00390 
00391                 //set submitted
00392                 $submitted = $this->gp['submitted'];
00393 
00394                 if($this->gp['step-1'] && !$submitted) {
00395                         $submitted = false;
00396                         $submit_reload = true;
00397 
00398                 }
00399 
00400                 //read template file
00401                 $this->readTemplateFile($settings);
00402 
00403                 //read language file
00404                 $this->readLanguageFile($settings);
00405 
00406                 // set stylesheet file
00407                 $this->setStyleSheet($settings);
00408 
00409                 //add some JavaScript for fancy form stuff
00410                 $this->addSpecialJS($settings);
00411 
00412                 //init view
00413                 if(!$settings['view']) {
00414                         $settings['view'] = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default";
00415                 }
00416                 $viewClass = $settings['view'];
00417                 $viewClass = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($viewClass);
00418                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent($viewClass);
00419                 $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM');
00420                 $view->setLangFile($this->langFile);
00421                 $view->setPredefined($this->predefined);
00422 
00423                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_view',$viewClass);
00424                 $errors = array();
00425                 session_start();
00426 
00427                 //if not submitted
00428                 if(!$submitted) {
00429 
00430                         if(!$submit_reload) {
00431 
00432                                 //clear session variables
00433                                 $this->clearSession();
00434                         }
00435 
00436                         //clear uploaded files in temp folder if configured
00437                         $this->clearTempFiles($settings['files.']['clearTempFilesOlderThanHours']);
00438 
00439                         unset($_SESSION['submitted_ok']);
00440 
00441                         //run preProcessors
00442                         $this->runClasses($settings['preProcessors.']);
00443 
00444                         //run init interceptors
00445                         $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00446 
00447                         //display form
00448                         $content = $view->render($this->gp,$errors).$this->additionalJS;
00449                         return $content;
00450 
00451                         //if submitted
00452                 } else {
00453 
00454                         // Stores GET / POST in the session addording to user defined
00455                         if ($settings['storeGP'] == 1 || F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'],'store_gp', 'sMISC')) {
00456                                 $this->storeUserGPinSession();
00457                         }
00458 
00459                         //run init interceptors
00460                         if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00461                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00462                         }
00463 
00464                         //run validation
00465                         $valid = array(true);
00466                         if(isset($settings['validators.']) && is_array($settings['validators.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00467                                 foreach($settings['validators.'] as $tsConfig) {
00468                                         $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00469                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_validator',$className);
00470                                         $validator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00471 
00472                                         $validator->loadConfig($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00473                                         $res = $validator->validate($errors);
00474                                         array_push($valid,$res);
00475                                 }
00476                         }
00477 
00478                         //if form is valid
00479                         if($this->isValid($valid)) {
00480                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00481                                         $this->processFiles();
00482                                 }
00483 
00484                                 //run save interceptors
00485                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00486                                         $this->runClasses($settings['saveInterceptors.']);
00487                                 }
00488 
00489                                 //run loggers
00490                                 if(isset($settings['loggers.']) && is_array($settings['loggers.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00491                                         foreach($settings['loggers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00492                                                 $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00493                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_logger',$className);
00494                                                 $logger = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00495                                                 $logger->log($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00496                                         }
00497                                 }
00498 
00499                                 //run finishers
00500                                 if(isset($settings['finishers.']) && is_array($settings['finishers.'])) {
00501 
00502                                         ksort($settings['finishers.']);
00503                                         foreach($settings['finishers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00504                                                 $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00505                                                 $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00506 
00507                                                 //check if the form was finished before. This flag is set by the F3_Finisher_Confirmation
00508                                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00509                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_finisher',$className);
00510                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00511                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00512                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00513 
00514                                                         $finisher->loadConfig($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00515 
00516                                                         // Tries to validate the configuration. This may return an exception.
00517                                                         $finisher->validateConfig();
00518 
00519                                                         //if the finisher returns HTML (e.g. F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation)
00520                                                         if($tsConfig['config.']['returns']) {
00521 
00522                                                                 return $finisher->process();
00523                                                         } else {
00524 
00525                                                                 $this->gp = $finisher->process();
00526                                                         }
00527 
00528                                                         //if the form was finished before, only show the output of the F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation
00529                                                 } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation"))) {
00530                                                         $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00531                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling finisher '.$className);
00532                                                         $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00533                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00534                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00535                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00536                                                         $finisher->loadConfig($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00537                                                         return $finisher->process();
00538                                                 }
00539                                         }
00540                                 }
00541 
00542                                 //not returned, but finished. What to do?
00543 
00544                                 //if form is not valid
00545                         } else {
00546 
00547                                 //show form with errors
00548                                 $content = $view->render($this->gp,$errors).$this->additionalJS;
00549                                 return $content;
00550                         }
00551                 }
00552 
00553 
00554         }

00561         protected function storeUserGPinSession() {
00562                 foreach ($this->gp as $key => $value) {
00563                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->fe_user->setKey('ses',$key , $value);
00564                 }
00565         }

00574         protected function setStyleSheet(&$settings) {
00575                 $stylesheetFile = $settings['stylesheetFile'];
00576                 if (strlen($stylesheetFile) > 0) {
00577 
00578                         // set stylesheet
00579                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_css'] .=
00580                                 '<link rel="stylesheet" href="'.F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolveRelPathFromSiteRoot($stylesheetFile).'" type="text/css" media="screen" />';
00581                 }
00582         }

00591         protected function readTemplateFile(&$settings) {
00592 
00593                 //template file was not set in flexform, search TypoScript for setting
00594                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00595 
00596                         $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00597                         if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00598                                 $this->templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00599                         } else {
00600                                 $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00601                         }
00602                 } else {
00603                         $templateFile = $this->templateFile;
00604                         $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00605                 }
00606 
00607                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00608                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::throwException('no_template_file');
00609                 }
00610 
00611         }

00620         protected function readLanguageFile(&$settings) {
00621 
00622                 //language file was not set in flexform, search TypoScript for setting
00623                 if(!$this->langFile) {
00624                         $langFile = $settings['langFile'];
00625                 } else {
00626                         $langFile = $this->langFile;
00627                 }
00628                 $this->langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::convertToRelativePath($langFile);
00629         }
00630 
00665         protected function addSpecialJS($settings) {
00666 
00667                 /*
00668                  * do fancy form.
00669                  * Adds JavaScript to replace checkboxes and radio buttons with graphics
00670                  */
00671                 if($settings['fancyForm'] == "1") {
00672                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_fancy');
00673                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_css'] .= '
00674                                 <link href="typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/JS/crir/crir.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen"/>
00675                         ';
00676                         if(!strstr($GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'],"/jquery.js")) {
00677                                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .=
00678                                 '<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/jquery/jquery.js"></script>';
00679                         }
00680                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .= '
00681                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/crir/crir.js"></script>
00682                                 ';
00683                         $parentId = $settings['fancyForm.']['parentId'];
00684                         if($parentId) {
00685                                 $this->additionalJS .= '
00686                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
00687                                         $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=checkbox]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00688                                         $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=radio]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00689                                 </script>';
00690                         } else {
00691                                 $this->additionalJS .= '
00692                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
00693                                         $("input[@type=checkbox]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00694                                         $("input[@type=radio]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00695                                 </script>';
00696                         }
00697                 }
00698 
00699                 /*
00700                  * Adds JavaScript for help texts. This texts will fade in, when the input fields gets focus and fade out on blur.
00701                  */
00702                 if(is_array($settings['helpTexts.'])) {
00703                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('enabling_help');
00704                         if(!strstr($GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'],"/jquery.js")) {
00705                                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .=
00706                                 '<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/jquery/jquery.js"></script>';
00707                         }
00708                         $class = $settings['helpTexts.']['className'];
00709                         $parentId = $settings['helpTexts.']['parentId'];
00710                         $parentTimes = $settings['helpTexts.']['parentTimes'];
00711                         $parent = "";
00712                         if(is_numeric($parentTimes)) {
00713                                 for($i = 0;$i < $parentTimes; $i++) {
00714                                         $parents .= 'parent().';
00715                                 }
00716                         }
00717                         $this->additionalJS .= '
00718                         <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
00719                                 $("#'.$parentId.' .'.$class.'").hide();
00720                                 $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=text]").focus(function(){
00721                                         $(this).'.$parents.'next().children(".'.$class.'").fadeIn("slow");
00722                                 });
00723                                 $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=text]").blur(function(){
00724                                         $(this).'.$parents.'next().children(".'.$class.'").fadeOut("slow");
00725                                 });
00726                         </script>';
00727                 }
00728 
00729                 /*
00730                  * Adds JavaScript for auto complete. If the user types some letters in a configured field, a list of suggestions will be shown.
00731                  */
00732                 if(is_array($settings['autoComplete.'])) {
00733                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('enabling_auto');
00734 
00735                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_css'] .= '
00736                                 <link href="typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/JS/autocomplete/jquery.autocomplete.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen"/>
00737                                 <link href="typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/JS/autocomplete/lib/thickbox.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen"/>
00738                         ';
00739                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .= '

00769         protected function isValid($valid) {
00770                 foreach($valid as $item) {
00771                         if(!$item) {
00772                                 return false;
00773                         }
00774                 }
00775                 return true;
00776         }
